participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Lena is enthusiastic and sociable. She loves to engage in conversations and enjoys sharing her weekend activities.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: David is thoughtful and caring. He values family and often speaks proudly about his daughter's accomplishments.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. my daughter is a child prodigy.
